title: China records song for London Olympics
cleanContent:
Actor Huang Xiaoming(1st L) performs in the music video recording in Beijing, capital of China, June 28, 2012. Huang Xiaoming and Fan Bingbing attended the record of song "Best Wishes from Beijing" on Thursday. The song shows the best wishes to London Olympic Games from Beijing.(Photo/Xinhua)

Actress Fan Bingbing (front) performs in the music video recording in Beijing, capital of China, June 28, 2012. Huang Xiaoming and Fan Binbin attended the record of song "Best Wishes from Beijing" on Thursday. The song shows the best wishes to London Olympic Games from Beijing.(Photo/Xinhua)

| |
